means: [人名] [苏格兰人姓氏] 格伦地貌名称，或住所名称，来源于盖尔语，含义是“河谷”(valley)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 格伦住所名称，可能是盖尔语的同源词，含义是“河谷”(valley)
[地名] [美国、南非共和国、瑞典] 格伦

sentence.Network_en: Perhaps it was that very oddness that attracted me to Glen's music.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许正是格伦音乐的怪异之处吸引了我。

sentence.Network_en: Glen Bronka wrote his own orchestral arrangements.
sentence.Network_cn: 格伦·布朗卡把自己的曲子改编成了管弦乐曲。

sentence.Network_en: Fitzpiers reached the edge of the glen overlooking the manor - house.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Scottish Gaelic and Irish gleann (earlier glenn)

entry.tran: （尤指苏格兰或爱尔兰的）峡谷
entry.def: A glen is a deep, narrow valley, especially in the mountains of Scotland or Ireland.

means.word_mean: 1. a narrow secluded valley (in the mountains)
